advice.label: Advice #001
advice.content: Take care of your mental health.

advice.label: Advice #002
advice.content: Begin each day with an activity that brings you joy and laughter to positively influence your mood.

advice.label: Advice #004
advice.content: Limit your consumption of processed foods.

advice.label: Advice #006
advice.content: Choose physical activities that you find enjoyable to make exercise a sustainable habit.

advice.label: Advice #007
advice.content: Schedule routine medical check-ups to monitor and maintain your health.

advice.label: Advice #012
advice.content: Prioritize whole, unprocessed foods over packaged or convenience foods.

advice.label: Advice #013
advice.content: Use deep breathing exercises to reduce stress and enhance relaxation.

advice.label: Advice #014
advice.content: Participate in activities and hobbies that keep you mentally and emotionally engaged.

advice.label: Advice #016
advice.content: Eat fiber-rich foods like vegetables, fruits, and whole grains to support digestion.

advice.label: Advice #018
advice.content: Identify and manage triggers that lead to emotional eating or unhealthy habits.

advice.label: Advice #019
advice.content: Plan your meals ahead of time to make healthy choices easier
